text:
BOOKING.COM - Amsterdam, Tel Aviv, Shanghai | ONSITE | VISA support| Relocation to Amsterdam

I am a mobile developer at Booking.com, the biggest accommodations site on this planet. We are looking to hire experienced people from anywhere in the world, and to relocate them to the beautiful city of Amsterdam to work with us.

Some of the positions available are:

* Software developer (Tel Aviv): https://grnh.se/wpvlai1

* iOS developer (Shanghai): https://grnh.se/jjufi0bx1

* Android developer (Shanghai): https://grnh.se/ngmta71

* Software Development Manager (Amsterdam): https://grnh.se/yam4uqgc1

* Software Development Manager (Tel Aviv): https://grnh.se/oekihlfl1

* Product Owner Infra (Amsterdam): https://grnh.se/r8u63vga1

* Product Owner Email Infra (Amsterdam): https://grnh.se/6jb47nnn1

You can find other open positions at https://grnh.se/30g5b71
